name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Rachel ROBINSON, Appellant

ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
453 A.2d 332
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Rachel ROBINSON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 6, 1982.
Decided Dec. 29, 1982.
Kenneth R. Dixon, (Court-appointed), Philadelphia, for appéllant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Stuart Haimowitz, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
